case.state: Oh... Hey, Miku. I didn't expect to see you here.

Hey everyone! Who's ready to...
Oh, she's here.
Hi, Miku.

Boo!
Happy Halloween, ~player~! Did I scare ya? Ready for some spoooky card games with sexy results?
Happy Halloween, ~player~. Will you play with me?
I'm all warmed up! Let's start this!
The cutest Vocaloid is ready to play!
Please go easy on me, okay? I'm just a beginner after all~
Let's get this show on the road, everyone!
One, two, three, four, five, six, seven... ten!
... Really, ~player~? Did you invite her?
... What kind of... abomination is that?
... Oh, I am so going to enjoy this... I'm not used to someone so... handful...
I should've expected to see you here, Miku. You've always liked being the center of attention.
Hey, Miku! Did you barge into here accidentally? This is strip poker, are you sure you're up for this challenge?
The more, the merrier! We could always use a pair of extra hands!
Are you here to help us have a better game? How thoughtful of you to lend a hand...
Come, come! No need to be scared, you're in good hands!
We have company? Good, I love to play with the audience!
Hey there! Ready to be entertained?
I hope you don't mind that I keep talking about "performing" and "shows" and stuff, I'm just so used to it!
It's good to have you here. The more, the better.
Is everyone ready to play? I apologize for the garden knife, I was just tending to my garden...

Let the best VOCALOID win!
... {small}Which is gonna be me!{!reset}
Let's make this a fair game, shall we, Miku? Let the best performer win.
Hello everyone! Your favorite VOCALOID has joined the game!
So, shall we begin?
It's always a pleasure to play with some of my fans! And if you're not a fan, by the end of this game, you'll eb one!
Time for the cutest, most talented VOCALOID to join the game! Hold your applauses until the end of the game!
I'm happy with the ones I've got now, thanks!
No thanks! I've got what I need!
Could it be...? I... actually don't need any cards!
I think this will do...? You know what? Just keep going, don't give me any cards. I can manage with these.
Keep your cards. I've got just what I need...
So many cards to make this hand even better...
And here I thought you couldn't make this hand even more perfect...
I think I'll have,,, ~cards.text~. But I already like this hand as it is.
Do you mind if I keep my hand? It's just so... pretty.
W-wait, I wasn't ready! Give me ~cards.text~!
Let's make this hand even better, shall we? ~cards.text~ will do.
Are you trying to make me lose on purpose? How devious. ~Cards.text~ will do.
No need to be so mean to me! I know you're trying to make me lose on purpose! Now give me ~cards.text~!
No stress! With enough confidence, and maybe ~cards.text~, I can win in the end!
Should I...? No, no, or maybe...? I will... take ~cards.text~, I think...?

Give me ~cards.text~! I can share some of my poker strategies if you want!
{small}The secret is that I don't have any! The real poker was inside you all along!{!reset}
I think I should take... ~cards.text~? I should've reread some poker strategies before coming here... Not that I care if I lose, but I try to keep games interesting...
The best Vocaloid requires the best poker hand, don't you think? So it's ~cards.text~ for me!

Huh? Oh, yeah, give me ~cards.text~ or whatever...
Why is this game so random anyway... Some games can end stupidly fast, and others can last forever...
Could the cutest-yet-sexiest Vocaloid get ~cards.text~, please?
It's gotta be... ~cards.text~. ~cards.text~, right? Is it?
If it's not too much to ask, mind if I get ~cards.text~?
It's gonna be ~cards.text~ for the famous virtual diva in the room!
Just you wait until the low overcomes the high...!
You'll see how the lower rules the higher in the end!
I suppose you could call this a good hand... But I think all hands are perfect as they are.
My hand is so unique and mysterious... I wonder if there's another hand that's just like mine...
Why do numbers and letters determine if a hand is good or not? I think they're all perfect as they are...
I suppose I won't have to strip this round... That's a shame, don't you think?
I got a good hand! In fact, I've got two! Tehee~!
Have you noticed how sharp the edges of these cards are? If you got a paper cut from these the wound would sting for hours...
Lies. It's all lies. This game is all lies...
Let's not cut each other's throats over who has the better hands, shall we?
There are so many interesting and unique people in these games... I don't think I have to keep my garden a secret anymore. But I'm keeping the details as a surprise!
This round's mine!
Now this is a hand!... I think, I hope so!
So, what did you all get? It doesn't matter, I'm not losing this one!
I think I can work with these... I hope! I don't actually know!
What did you get? Show me, show me!
This is a great hand! Unless I got poker completely wrong, which is a possibility!
Now, bow to me!
Oh, it seems you'll be enjoying someone else's stripping this round. Don't worry. You'll get another chance to watch me!
I'm coming at you with the power of a road roller, and you won't stop me!
I don't need no "master" or "producer" anymore! I'm gonna fly on my own, and roll all over you like a road roller!
Close, but not this time! You're not watching Rin-chan touch herself yet!
Giving me good cards this late in the game? You're not in the mood to watch me perform, are you?
Oh, what terrible hand I have! What could Rin-chan do now!? Am I really going to lose now?
I doubt I'll be losing this one. So... mind if we just skip to the next round? I doubt there's anyone more interesting to watch than me, anyway.

Did you know that card throwing isn't actually harmful? At least not with modern cards. If you were to use ancient cards made out of wood pulp you could sharpen the edges to cut a throat in a single slice!
So many hands... of poker. Holding cards in such different, yet unique ways... Fufufu...
~blank~

This hand is so pretty... Sometimes it has five of them, but occassionally there'll be four...
Cards, that is.
Fufufu...

What a lovely game! Three to five players holding things and then stripping their clothes...
{small}So that's six to ten poker-playing hands...{!reset}
Do you come here often? And, most importantly... do you usually come with friends, or do you prefer to come alone?
It's nice to finally meet adventurous people. I'm used to scaredy-cats who are afraid of the silliest things... Like walking home alone, or hanging out with a friend in the dark...

... Are we friends now? Do you consider me your friend?
Do you trust me?
I might need a ride after the game. Does anyone want to drive me home? I'll make sure our time together is worth it...
Are you afraid of the city at night,~player~? I could walk with you to make sure you don't get lost...
I just need any of you to have a worse hand than mine, right?
Alright... I hope this'll do...
I can work with these... right?
Nothing to worry about! I have this under control, I swear!
It's okay, it's okay... I can do this! I won't lose my hope!
I have no idea how to play this game, but I will give it my all!
If I get a single queen, that counts as a two pair, right? Wouldn't you think of me as a queen already?
I'm not sure if getting a good or bad hand is either good or bad... Isn't the point of the game to lose and strip?
Jeez, if you wanted to watch me touching myself so badly, you could've used the internet instead of giving me this hand...

I know I'm getting closer to the end, so... can I say I really enjoy being here? Most people who want to watch me in lewd situations just use the internet, fondle themselves and move on, but in here we can actually chat and enjoy a more intimate experience!
I don't think I'll win this time, but I'm not gonna run away or anything. I'm so tired of people running away from situations they don't like...

Uhm.. I think I'll have to strip next... Sigh...
I was hoping to see you unfastening your belts, or unbuttoning your buttons...
I hope this game doesn't take too long... Tendingna garden on my own is a very time-consuming hobby...
I like to keep my knife sharp and always close... You never know when you'll find something worth cutting and taking back to the garden...
A-a bad hand? That's ridiculous! All hands are beautiful and unique, even those who are very similar...
I don't mind getting a bad hand... All hands are one-of-a-kind, after all. This is an experience worth remembering.
Oh, what a lovely hand... Who could ever call you "bad"? You're perfect as you are...
... This might've been a bad day to forget I wasn't wearing a bra...
Wait... Did I forgot to put on a bra today?
... I just realized I forgot to put on a bra before coming here...

Shoot, a bad hand this early... Well, at least I- Wait
... I-I forgot to wear a bra!
Oh no no no...
I'll save you some time and start stripping...
... Maybe there's some rule I don't know that makes me win in the end?
I should've learned how to play poker instead of randomly picking cards...
Alright, keep it cool, keep it cool, no need to have a meltdown over it...
Who cares if I got a bad hand!? M-maybe someone else got a worse one! That's the thrilling part of the game!
Even I know this hand is bad... Whatever! Bring it on!
Would you look at that! Three pairs! You better watch out for this hand!
What is this abstract nonsense!? Give me my cards back!

RNG can be such a b... meanie, sometimes. Like when you're listening to my songs on YouTube and it suddenly decides to play Miku's songs instead, and then it's all Miku's songs or Miku's covers of my songs...
Aw, come on!
You can't be serious!
I might as well sit down and start touching myself...
I-It's okay! It's okay! I still have this! I can pull through, right? Right?

There's a zombie on your lawn...
There's a zombie on your lawn... ♪

There's a zombie on your lawn...
We don't want zombies on the lawn! ♫
So, ~player~, have you listened to my songs lately? If you're in the mood for one of the classics, why not listen to Meltdown? Some say it's my best work!
Mind if I recommend you a song, ~player~? If you want to listen to a cool song with a cool beat about running from home and feeling down, Tokyo Teddy Bear might be right up your alley!
If you don't mind, ~player~... Can I invite you to listen to one of my songs today? If you're feeling lovey-dovey or in need of some affection, perhaps you'd enjoy I Like You, I Love You?

Oh ho ho ho ho!
~Player~, I order you to stop your lecherous activities and listen to Daughter of Evil right now! And if you already have, listen to the rest of the Seven Deadly Sins Series!
Hey, ~player~... If it's not too much to ask... could I ask that you give Kokoro a listen? I worked really hard perfecting that song, and.. I'd just... I'd just like you to hear it. Please?
Hey, hey, ~player~! Don't you just hate schooling and the burdens it brings? If you do, why don't you give Lost One's Weeping a listen? I'm sure it'll speak to you!
Are you tired of being nice, ~player~? Don't you just want to go... listen to Abstract Nonsense to feel a little less alone in your tiredness?
You know what? All this stripping reminds me of a song! Why, it's a perfect day to listen to I Can Take Off My Panties! And yes, that is the real name of the song!
Are you a fan of my works, ~player~? If not, why don't you listen to Bird of Paradise or Tengaku to get you started? I'm very proud of how those songs came out!
Lots of people would like Rin-chan to be their girlfriend... But there's only one Rin-chan! In the meantime, why don't you give Demon Girlfriend a listen?
Were you ever confused by love, ~player~? If so, why not give Melancholy a listen? I think you might relate to the lyrics! I... just want you to listen to it, pretty please?

Uwa! Is it Halloween already?
... No? Not yet? Sorry, I've been singing Happy Halloween, one of my greatest hits of all time, so much that I got lost into it!

Uwa! Is it Halloween already?
... No? Not yet? Sorry, I've been singing Happy Halloween, one of my greatest hits of all time, so much that I got lost into it!

♫ I'm not usually the type to hold a grudge,
but... you've affected me.
And now... I'm nothing.
But {b}RAGE!{!reset} ♪
That was a small demonstration of Karma, a song that if you havent' heard yet, you should.
Are you in the mood to travel, ~player~? Because if you listen to Deep Sea City Underground, I'll be sure to take you for a ride!
~Player~! If I can get your attention, mind giving the song ROKI a listen sometime? Perhaps right now? I'm sure you'd like it if you listened to it!

Uwaa!
Sorry, ~player~, I got startled for a bit... I was just thinking about Fear Garden, one of the scariest songs I've sung! Perhaps you'd like to listen to it to make me feel less scared?
I was just thinking... Why don't you put in some background music, ~player~? You could listen to my song, Tiger Rampage, on the background while watching me strip...
Things sure are gonna get heated to~background.time~, huh? Why don't you put in some background music, ~player~? Something like... The Celestial Fox by me, perhaps?
To~background.time~ sure is a sweet ~background.time~! You know what could make it sweeter, ~player~? Listening to Sweet Magic, sung by me! Go listen to it now!
You know? There's already too many Miku Expos! It's time for a Rin Expo! And we could start by listening to RIN EXPO, the song about me getting my own expo... in spanish!
Did... Did I just get the worst hand possible?
You could've just told me to start touching myself instead of giving me the literal worst hand in the game!

Some producers love to portray me as a yandere type...
 
You don't want to find out why.
Sweetie, sweetie, sweetie magical... Sweetie, sweetie, sweetie, yeah, yeah! ♪
Your hand just twitched, ~player~. Did you get no pairs?
Have you gotten a bad set of cards, ~player~? Your index finger twitched for a bit.
Is everything alright, ~player~? You tightened your grip on the cards...
Your middle finger just tapped lightly on the cards... Are you not satisfied with your hand, ~player~?
Someone's hand just had a quiet spasm... Someone who's probably stripping next...
I see you're keeping your cool, ~player~, but your middle finger just gave you away. Don't worry, even if you got a "bad hand", I still think you have a beautiful hand...
Oh... do I really have to? I don't mind, but...
Oh... So I just lost, then...
... I see... Do you mind if I do this quickly? I'd rather watch you strip than stripping myself...
Oh no...!
... Oh well... I'll just put this aside for a bit, I wouldn't want to accidentally cut myself and get bloodstains on my clothes...
... I'd rather watch you than the other way around, but I'll play along...
I'll be joining you soon, Miku! But I'll make sure to put on a better show than yours!
It's gonna be me, then? I've already beaten who I came here to beat, so I don't mind.
You hear that, Miku? I'm joining you soon!
E-eh? T-this is just a small setback! I can still beat you, Miku!

I thought that strategy was gonna do it...
Doesn't matter. I'll win in the end. You'll see!
Oh, well. Guess I'll have to show off more of my delicate and graceful body. Can you really call that a loss?
Oh well, at least I'm wearing more than everyone else!
I'm not doing so bad, I could be down to your levels!
The game is not over yet! And I'm still winning by a long shot!

Oh, it's tea time! I gotta leave now, bye!
 
... Fine, I'll keep playing.
This is what I get for not properly learning how to play...
Fine! You will have your strip. But you better watch closely, I won't lose again!
I'm not out yet! As long as someone is having it worse than me, I've still got some advantage!
This isn't fair! You're all wearing more clothes than me!
You have to be cheating, right? How is this not cheating!?
Hah! So it's... oh, it's me.
I need to get better at this game asap...
Hold on, if the goal of the game is to strip, am I losing... or actually winning?
Oh, jeez, is it me again? Do you really want to watch poor innocent Rin-chan strip again?
You must really want to see me strip if you're bringing such big cards to the table...
I should've worn something else if I was gonna play with such buzzkills...
It appears that Rin-chan will have to show all these over-clothed buzzkils how you can do much more with less!
It's not fair! You're all wearing way too many clothes!
Did I come here underdressed...? You don't think Rin-chan is lewd or anything, right...?
These gloves keep my hands from getting dirty... or getting bruised... I'll be so exposed now...
Keeping your hands protected from all harm is essential to... everything, really. Have you noticed how we need our hands for everything?
I'll be so exposed without my gloves... But I have to admit there's some kind of... thrill in watching someone taking off their gloves...
Please don't ogle at my hands too much, I haven't put lotion on them for a while, nor have I trimmed my nails today. Gosh, how could I have been so careless...

Sometimes I wonder if I'd rather lose an arm or a leg...
I'd definitely lose the leg. Both of them, if needed.
If you had to choose between amputating your arms or your legs, which one would you choose? Personally, I'd cut my legs in a heartbeat.
Proper leg care is so boring... Legs are long, dull, plain and uninteresting. I can't believe some people get turned on just by looking at them.
Ogle at my legs all you want, I think they're overrated. If you had to choose between having your legs or arms ripped out, most people would choose the legs in a heartbeat.
I guess these have to go...
Boots are so boring anyway...
If it wasn't because I need to keep my feet from stepping on the broken flowerpot pieces, I wouldn't wear boots at all...
Dumb boots on my dumb feet, attached to my dumb long legs, why are they so far away from... e-eh?
I never had a chance to win that round, huh? Well, my hands are tied, so I guess it can't be helped...
If you like this ~background~, you should see my garden... It's so beautiful, so full of my blooming pretties...
I'll strip the dress for you, but next time we'll play at my garden, okay? Promise me! Promise me you'll come to my garden!
We should all meet up at my garden next time... Although it is a bit small, perhaps we could play one-on-one?
Uuhm... I can't seem to be able to unbutton my bra, either... I don't suppose you could give me a hand again?
Don't mind the stains on my bra. Tending a beautiful garden usually leaves one with one or two bleeding cuts.
... So... would it be too much to ask for help again? I might need a hand unbuttoning my bra...
Do I have your full attention now? If only you could see your own expression... Are you putting your hands all over me in your mind?
I'm completely exposed to you now... I didn't expect things to go this far...
I didn't think I'd like the idea of losing, but... If you're all willing to lose as well, it's not so bad...
What's the point of losing if I'm gonna have to touch myself like every other ~background.time~... If only someone else wanted to touch me as well...
How did this get out of hand so badly... This is what happens when I try my hand at strip poker with no practice...
So, this is how I pay for my little bra prank...? I suppose it's fair...
You were expecting for this moment all game, weren't you? To see Kagamine Rin's... oranges. Well...

I don't mind doing this at all, but... But...
I don't really have anything to say, I'm just stalling...
The ribbon stays on at all times. So... I'll be showing you these instead. Hope you're prepared for it.
Sleeves are a great way to make your design pop off! Especially if they're iconic yet easy to make, therefore easy to cosplay!
People often say I use sleeves because I want to resemble Miku... It hurts, because they never tell Luka that. They just want to make fun of me.
I actually like these sleeves. They're comfy and iconic, and wearing them next to Miku and Luka's make you feel like you're part of something greater.
Most of my outfits don't have sleeves like these, so I enjoy the opportunity to wear them again.
I've been wearing these sleeves since I was a little kid... Well, not these exact same sleeves, but you get what I mean!
Make sure to take care of these, alright? My accessories are part of my iconic style, which is... important to me.

So I'll just take off my underwear...
 
... {small}Take off my underwear, take off my underwear, alright... ♫ {!reset}

Fine, I'll get to it. Sigh...
{small}(Pantsu nugeru mon, pantsu nugeru mon, pantsu nugeru mon, ne... ♪){!reset}
Well, it's all part of the show... I-It's all about putting up a good performance...

You can watch all you want, as long as you don't touch anything...
... Well, not that you could, with the whole "being a virtual idol" thing, but still...
... Do you expect me to say something interesting? You're watching a world-renowned idol taking off her panties for you, isn't that interesting enough?
I'm technically winning, right? The intent of the game is to strip, after all...
Well, at least this is pretty entertaining to watch! Rin-chan always strives to be a good performer!
I can already hear the comparisons... "Oh, but Miku-chan always takes off her panties with a smile!"
Oh well, I guess the shoes have to go now...
I'm sorry taking off my shoes isn't more interesting, I'm just... I'm just taking off my shoes, okay?
Some idols try to make every single action they do as flashy as possible. Like, taking off their shoes by sending them flying or something. I'm here to relax, you know?
I'm sure Miku doesn't take off her shoes with a smile... Wait, maybe she does, should I smile too...?

I'll just take these off and... oh, I hope I'm not being compared to Miku because I don't take off my shoes with a stupid grin on my face or anything. With the fans we have, I wouldn't be surprised...
I should try to make something flashy to take off my shoes, like a kick or...! E-eh?
Perhaps I could ask someone to take off my shoes instead? Would that make my stripping more interesting? What if I...? E-eh? W-wait...!
I could make a little eye-catching dance to take off my shoes, right? Something like this! Or like... W-whoa!
Oh well, I suppose I'm going next. Am I putting on a good show, though? As long as I'm not boring you, I'm doing something right!
You're really picking up steam after the bra prank... You're not mad, right?
I've gotta say, you're really getting your game on! Keep this up and you might actually see my chest soon!
If this is the price I gotta pay for the bra prank I pulled on you, so be it! I'll just have to play better next time...
Good thing I prefer comfy clothes that I can strip out of easily... But trust me, I don't plan on losing more clothes anytime soon!
You worked really hard to see my chest, right? Since I forgot to wear a bra and all... Well, here's your reward...
Ugh, you heard me saying that I didn't wear a bra and tried harder to get me to strip, right? You perv!
My, are you so eager to see me naked? Is that why you step up your game as soon as you heard me saying I wasn't wearing a bra? Well, in that case...
You heard me saying that I wasn't wearing a bra, right? That's the reason you started playing better? Oh well, here goes nothing, then...
A gardener's hands are her life... I gave my life to save them...
I'll make sure not to lose anymore... I came here to look at you, not to be looked at...
I'll just have to try harder not to lose anymore...
If I keep my head collected and I plan my moves correctly, things probably won't get out of hand.
If I'm gonna play without my gloves, I'll have to be extra careful not to get paper cuts or anything... I need my hands to keep tending my garden...
Let's just get this over with so I can keep watching you fiddle with your cards...
Let's move this along so I can see your next plays and try to guess your tells...
Anyway... Back to the game, and back to watching you flicking through poker hands...
Things are starting to get out of hand, I need to play more carefully...
We'll get our clothes back at the end of the game, right? I hope they're in good hands...
It's nice to play with people who never judge me for my second-hand clothes...
I'm not particularly proud of my legs... I know some people who can outrun me easily, I guess I should focus more on them...
I can't seem to... oh, jeez, I might have forgotten how to take this dress off. Could you lend me a hand?
What's wrong? Am I taking too long undressing? Jeez, I might have forgotten how to take this dress off! Could you give me a hand?
Oops, it seems I forgot this dress has a zipper... Could you give me a hand ?
I'm having some trouble taking my dress off... Could any of you lend me a hand, please?
The doctor said they'd grow bigger if they got stimulated often. So, if you're willing to give me a hand...
I'd prefer if you didn't comment on my chest. Unless you want to lend a hand on stimulating it to make it grow bigger.
You've all seen one of these before, so why don't we just continue?

I'd rather if you didn't comment on my "lady flower".
Yes, I've heard gardeners call it that. No, I don't get it either.
I'll just wash my hands and let fate decide whatever happens in these next rounds.
Ow... I guess that's what I get for wanting to force a weird stripping gimmick...
Owowow... That wasn't what I planned...
Ouch... Sorry, I didn't mean for that to happen...
Ouch... Well, that's one way to make a flashy strip...
I... ouch... well... I guess people will tease me by saying Miku strips even better than I do now...
Don't worry, it's not gonna be long until I show the good stuff. I'm not wearing a bra, after all.

Just don't you start comparing me to Miku, okay? None of that "Oh but Miku strips with a big dumb grin on her face!" or "Miku got a lot thicker when she became an adult!"
Well, I'll tell you one good thing about not being as thick, you can go braless anytime. Like I am right now.
Don't be bored, though! I'm not wearing a bra, so I'll be showing the good stuff soon!
What a day to forget putting on a bra... I just hope I can pick up steam on the next rounds...
I need to be more careful with my plays... I forgot to wear a bra today, so I might be very close to showing way too much skin soon...
Got you! You're gonna have to play better than that to get to see my chest!

Sorry, but if you want me to show you my oranges, you'll have to play better than that! What are you gonna do? Play with Miku instead?
 
... Wait, you're not actually gonna leave me for Miku, right?
Denied! I was wearing a bra all this time! Sorry, but I'm not a kid anymore. I can't just not wear one, that'd be painful!
Nope! You were expecting to see my chest, but I was actually wearing a bra the whole time! You'll have to try harder than that!
Psyche! I'm actually wearing a bra! What a twist, right? Look at the face you're making right now! It's priceless!
I might as well take these off too... I don't want to be accused of stalling with them.
I'll take these off as well. I'd rather have you ogling at my legs rather than my feet.
I've been working hard to keep my legs clean, shaved and in shape! I prefer you to look at them rather than my feet...
Anyway, shall we continue? I've still got a lot more song in me!
Let's not lose speed, everyone! There's still a chorus and a crescendo to this song, so let's keep it going!
Jeez, I'm not boring you, am I? I'll... I'll sing you a song! Perhaps I can dance, too? Maybe do some magic tricks with the cards...?
I hope I'm not making this boring for you... Am I? I'll strip more soon! O-or maybe I won't, and I'll play better to put on a better challenge! W-whatever thing you prefer!
Luckily, I'm already used to being in bikinis and underwear in front of others. With all the outfits I have to wear, I could perfectly pass for a model!
There we go! A petite idol for all your ogling needs! Remember, you can watch all you want, but no touchsies!
So... this is it. I know I'm on the smaller side, so no need to rub it in...
Take a good look! You played your cards right, literally, so you've earned a peek or two at my naked chest! But don't slow down, the game's not over yet!
And here I thought open rehearsals were an invasion of privacy...
Do I have your full attention now? Good! Keep your eyes on Rin-chan, and I'll give you a show you'll never forget!
H-here they are! Rin-chan's... I... can't do the oranges joke anymore. I know they're a bit smaller than that...
This surely makes up for the prank earlier, right? Come on! You have to admit it was hilarious! And you still got to see me naked, so we all won in the end!
So... this is it. I don't really have anything else to lose. But I'm still in the game, right? So I'll give it my all, still.
Welp! There goes that! Rin-chan's fully exposed now. But I've still got a chance to win, so don't count me out yet!
Just because you've got me fully naked doesn't mean that the show is over! I've still got more in me, so I hope you can keep cheering me on!

I can already hear the complaints... "Oh, but Miku-chan is shaved! Rin-chan's innocence is lost with that hair!"
Look, this was requested by the Inventory, okay? If it was for me, you know I'd always prioritize the naive cuteness that made me famous...
Such strong, manly hands... You can see the veins spreading like beautiful rivers on a map...
